summary: Biography of Luigi Di Liegro, an Italian priest and activist who dedicated his life to helping homeless people, people with AIDS and immigrants despite opposition from backward sectors of the Vatican and Italian society.

title: El hombre de la caridad, Don Luigi Di Liegro
